data.title: Contact us
data.meta_description: The UNDP Representation Office in Brussels is located in the UN House, which hosts several UN agencies, funds and programmes. Here are our contact details:
data.text:
The UNDP Representation Office in Brussels is located in the UN House, which hosts several UN agencies, funds and programmes. Here are our contact details:

Address: Boulevard du Regent 37-40, 1000 Brussels, Belgium

Tel.: +32 2 505 46 20

Fax: +32 2 503 47 29

E-mail: brussels.office@undp.org

Media (Journalists)

E-mail: UNDP-newsroom@undp.org

News Centre | Media Contacts

Investigation Hotline

To report a complaint or concern, please contact UNDP through its investigation hotline. For more information, read our scam alert.

Jobs & Internships

To apply for a job/internship or view current vacancies, please visit UNDPâ€™s Job Site .

If you are experiencing difficulties with online job applications, please CONTACT US .

Country Offices

Find out about UNDP's programmes and activities around the world:

Africa | Arab States | Asia & the Pacific | Europe & Central Asia| Latin America & the Caribbean

Representation Offices
